description: Number of orientable necklaces with n beads and two colors; i.e. turning the necklace over does not leave it unchanged.
references: John P. McSorley and Alan H. Schoen: On k-Ovals and (n, k, lambda)-Cyclic Difference Sets, and Related Topics, Discrete Math., 313 (2013), 129-154. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 26 2012
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Dec 22 2000
